Initial commit: WhatsApp Warmer AI - Automated conversation tool

Features:
- AI-powered WhatsApp conversation automation using Gemini AI
- Single warming account with multi-number targeting
- WhatsApp Web integration via whatsapp-web.js
- Real-time chat view with iPhone-style phone displays
- Customizable AI personality and conversation context
- Live chat monitoring segmented by phone number
- Demo mode for testing UI without WhatsApp login
- Responsive design with horizontal phone layout

Tech stack:
- Electron.js desktop application
- Google Gemini AI (gemini-2.0-flash-exp)
- whatsapp-web.js for WhatsApp Web API
- LocalAuth for session persistence
